short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you capture text or link, and then send them to Thino.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use thino capture to send text/url in chrome to Thino. Or edit them in sidebar panel without switch to Obsidian.

你可以用 Thino Capture 来裁剪你选择的内容、链接到 Thino 中。或者在侧边栏编辑发送 Thino 到本地，而不需要切换到 Obsidian。
